means: 莱茵兰(德国莱茵河西部地区)

sentence.Network_en: Rhineland dishes are a speciality of the restaurant.
sentence.Network_cn: 莱茵兰菜是这家饭店的特色菜。

sentence.Network_en: The Rhineland children tramped into Italy.
sentence.Network_cn: 来因兰的儿童徒步走到意大利.

sentence.Network_en: The seizure of the Rhineland and its subsequent fortification were the greatest gamble of all.
sentence.Network_cn: 强占来因兰和在来因兰设防是最大的赌博.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 约公元前2000年(2000 BC),从现在的荷兰和莱茵兰(Rhineland)地区来了宽口陶器人(the Beaker Folks)。 简单地说,我们可以把凯尔特人(the Celts),也被称为不列颠.

list.abs: beijing to rhinelander international ticket prices ., 北京到莱茵兰德特价机票价格.

means.word_mean: 1. a picturesque region of Germany around the Rhine river
